bf.gamemode.boot.description: Make your way through the official Training Course to learn the basics of the game!
bf.gamemode.conq.description: With your team, capture as many points as possible to win. The team that loses the least tickets wins!
bf.gamemode.description.title: [o] %s
bf.gamemode.dom.description: With your team, capture as many points as possible to win. The team with the most points wins!
bf.gamemode.ffa.description: With limited time and a max score, you must kill all other players in the match to win!
bf.gamemode.gg.description: Upgrade your weapon after every kill. Frequent death will decrease your count, first player to reach the top weapon wins!
bf.gamemode.inf.description: You and your fellow comrades must survive against the never ending waves of the undead!
bf.gamemode.sg.description: Survive in the wasteland amongst other well trained soldiers. Become the last survivor to win!
bf.gamemode.tdm.description: With limited time and a max score, you must kill all the Players on the other Team before they kill you!
bf.gamemode.ttt.description: There are traitors hiding amongst us! We must eliminate them before they eliminate us!
bf.item.gun.name: %2$s

bf.message.gamemode.class.anti.tank.desc: Effective in mid-range to long-range combat, commonly equipped with explosives and rocket-propelling weaponry
bf.message.gamemode.class.assault.desc: Effective in close-quarters combat, equipped with effective close-range weaponry
bf.message.gamemode.class.assault.title: Assault
bf.message.gamemode.class.commander.desc: Leads their troops into battle. Equipped with command radio and equipment to call in air strikes and support
bf.message.gamemode.class.error.exp: You need %s EXP to equip this class level! You only have %s!
bf.message.gamemode.class.error.full: Cannot change to this class! Too many players as class (%s Max)
bf.message.gamemode.class.error.rank: You must be %s or higher to use this class!
bf.message.gamemode.class.gunner.desc: Effective for mid-range suppressive fire to help fellow soldiers advance
bf.message.gamemode.class.gunner.title: Gunner
bf.message.gamemode.class.light.infantry: Similar traits to rifleman class, commonly equipped with semi-automatic firearms
bf.message.gamemode.class.medic.desc: Provides efficient and mobile medical support for all other troops in the battlefield
bf.message.gamemode.class.medic.title: Medic
bf.message.gamemode.class.respawn: You will re-spawn with the %s class!
bf.message.gamemode.class.rifleman.desc: Effective in mid-range combat and harsh battle endurance
bf.message.gamemode.class.rifleman.title: Rifleman
bf.message.gamemode.class.sniper.desc: Effective in long-range combat, giving support to fellow soldiers, or calling out enemy advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.sniper.title: Sniper
bf.message.gamemode.class.specialist.des: Effective in mid-range combat. Commonly uses a combination of flanking and tactical advancements
bf.message.gamemode.class.support.desc: Effective for mobility while maintaining high-powered support fire for fellow soldiers
bf.message.gamemode.class.support.title: Support
%s has just lost their own %s kill streak!
%s has just ended their own %s kill streak!
bf.message.gamemode.combat.streak.increa: %s now has a %s kill streak after killing %s!
bf.message.gamemode.command.fail: You cannot use that command while in a match!
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.boundary.ki: You were killed for leaving the battlefield!
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.boundary.wa: You are leaving the battlefield! Return in %s seconds!
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.capture.poi: The point %s is invalid or doesn't exist!
The point %s is still neutral! Try another one.
The point %s is not captured by your team! Try another one.
The point %s is overrun! Try another one.
Selected point %s as your spawn point!
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.tip.0: Your objective is to work as a team to capture and control as many points as possible.
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.tip.1: You can capture points by standing near them. The more players, the faster the capture.
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.tip.2: The more capture points that you have captured, the faster the enemy team's score will decrease.
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.tip.3: The team with the most remaining score at the end of the game will win. Good luck!
bf.message.gamemode.conquest.tip.4: Press %s to change your class, and %s to use a callout.
bf.message.gamemode.domination.tip.0: Your objective is to capture and hold a majority of the objectives.
bf.message.gamemode.domination.tip.1: The greater number of friendly soldiers occupying an objective, the faster it will be captured.
bf.message.gamemode.domination.tip.2: The more objectives your team holds, the faster your team will score points.
bf.message.gamemode.domination.tip.3: The first team to reach the score limit wins. If the time limit is reached, the team with the most points wins.
bf.message.gamemode.domination.tip.4: Press %s to change your class, and %s to use a callout.
bf.message.gamemode.ffa.tip.0: Your objective is to gain a total of %s kills before the time runs out.
bf.message.gamemode.ffa.tip.1: You can gain kills by eliminating other players. Each kill will grant you 1 point.
bf.message.gamemode.ffa.tip.2: The player with the most kills at the end of the game will win. Good luck!
bf.message.gamemode.gungame.tip.0: Your objective is to work your way up the gun ladder by getting kills.
bf.message.gamemode.gungame.tip.1: Each kill will grant you a new weapon. The first player to get a kill with every weapon wins!
bf.message.gamemode.gungame.tip.2: The player that gets the final knife kill will win the game. Good luck!
bf.message.gamemode.infected.dead.countd: You will respawn when the round ends!
bf.message.gamemode.infected.reimbursed: You have been granted %s for joining the match after round %s!
bf.message.gamemode.infected.store.buy.f: You're unable to buy a %s! Got enough points?
bf.message.gamemode.infected.store.resup: The vendor has refreshed their stock!
bf.message.gamemode.infected.tip.0: Your objective is to survive a total of %s waves of zombies.
bf.message.gamemode.infected.tip.1: You can earn cash by eliminating zombies. Each kill will grant you more cash.
bf.message.gamemode.infected.tip.2: Use the cash to purchase weapons, ammo, and more from the weapon vendor.
bf.message.gamemode.infected.tip.3: You can also purchase doors to unlock new areas of the map. Good luck!
Wave %s has begun, with %s infected hounds!
bf.message.gamemode.infected.wave.comple: Wave %s has been completed, with %s survivor(s)!
bf.message.gamemode.leftworld: You left the match world! Teleporting to lobby!
bf.message.gamemode.medic.bag.heal: You've been healed by a medical bag!
bf.message.gamemode.medicalbag.heal: You've been healed by a medical bag!
bf.message.gamemode.notification.point.l: The enemy forces have captured control point %s!
We've lost control point %s to the enemy!
bf.message.gamemode.player.join.spectato: %s joined the match as a spectator
bf.message.gamemode.radio.command.airstr: You've initiated a precision-strike! Take cover!
You've initiated an air-strike! Take cover!
bf.message.gamemode.radio.command.fail.s: Cannot use the radio this close to a team spawn!
bf.message.gamemode.radio.command.fail.t: Air-support is resupplying! Air-support availability in %s!
bf.message.gamemode.radio.command.reinfo: You've called in a machine gun unit!
bf.message.gamemode.radio.command.toteam: Your commander has placed a new %s marker!
bf.message.gamemode.survivalgames.loot.f: This supply crate has already been looted!
bf.message.gamemode.survivalgames.loot.r: All supply crates will refill in %s minute(s)!
All supply crates will refill in %s!
All supply crates have been refilled!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.di: Switching teams is currently disabled in this game-mode!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.la: Too late into match to switch teams!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.po: Can not switch teams during post-game!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.sc: Score is too close to switch teams!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.ti: You must wait before attempting to switch teams again!
bf.message.gamemode.switchteams.error.un: Teams are not balanced enough to switch!
bf.message.gamemode.tdm.tip.0: Your objective is to work as a team to gain a total of %s kills.
bf.message.gamemode.tdm.tip.1: The team that reaches the score limit first or has the most kills at the end of the game will win.
bf.message.gamemode.tdm.tip.2: You can gain kills by eliminating players from the opposing team. Each kill will grant your team 1 point.
bf.message.gamemode.tip.store: Press %s to open the buy menu
bf.message.gamemode.tip.title: Tip:
bf.message.gamemode.troubletown.tip.0: Your objective is determined by the role that you are granted at the beginning of a round.
bf.message.gamemode.troubletown.tip.1: Innocent and Detectives must work together to figure out which players are traitors.
bf.message.gamemode.troubletown.tip.2: Traitors must eliminate all Innocent and Detectives in order to win. If the Traitors are eliminated, the Innocents win.
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.jester.death.dir: Someone killed you! Congrats! You are now an Innocent.
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.jester.death: %s was stupid enough to kill the Jester, %s!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.killed: You were killed by %s, they were a(n) %s!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.loadout.fail: You need %s point(s) to buy this item!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.loadout: You've purchased the %s from your buy menu for %s point(s)
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.murderinfo.disco: %s has discovered the body of %s. They were a(n) %s!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.murderinfo.title: Unidentified Dead Body
%s's Dead Body
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.points.gain: Your team has gained %s point(s) for good work.
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.random.kill: Stop random killing! You've been punished.
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.randomat.melon.c: Melon Party! All players have been given a Melon Cannon!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.randomat.nextbot: An evil beast has spawned! Beware!
What's that? Something is spawning here... better run away!
Random Explode! A random player will explode every 30 seconds!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.randomat.speed: Speed Boost! All players get a randomly timed and powered speed boost!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.role.detective.d: Protect the Innocent and uncover the Traitors!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.role.jester.desc: Try to trick a player into killing you!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.role.traitor.des: Kill every other player who is not a Traitor!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.roles.all: There are %s traitors and %s detectives! Good luck!
bf.message.gamemode.ttt.traitor.fart: Peeoh! I think a Traitor just farted...
bf.message.ingame.ac.kick: %s disconnected before vote and was suspended for Vote Evasion.
bf.message.ingame.challenges.reminder: You have %s challenges that you can complete in this match!

bf.message.ingame.soundboard.fail.time: Please wait %s second(s) before playing a sound!
bf.message.ingame.warcry.commander: War Cry Available! Use %s to activate!
bf.message.ingame.warcry: Press %s to use your war cry! (%s)
bf.message.intro.content.message: This mod includes realistic depictions of warfare, weapons, and graphic violence. It’s intended for mature audiences. Click %s to proceed or %s if unsuitable.
bf.message.intro.content.title: Content Disclaimer
bf.message.intro.discord.message: Feel free to join our Discord Server, where you can chat with other players, report bugs, and suggest new features!
bf.message.intro.discord.title: Official Discord Server
bf.message.intro.online.connecting.tip: Attempting to re-establish a connection to the %s cloud network.

bf.message.intro.online.verifying.tip: Attempting to authenticate your Minecraft session with the cloud network.
bf.message.intro.refer.player.message: You receive %s+ EXP by submitting the username of the player that suggested this mod to you. They will also receive a %s for it!
bf.message.intro.refer.player.title: Refer a Player
bf.message.intro.rules.message: Before continuing, please ensure that you have read our official rules and privacy policy!

bf.message.prompt.clan.create: Enter a name for your new brigade.

bf.message.prompt.clan.invite.title: Invite A Player
bf.message.prompt.clan.invite: Enter the username of the player you would like to invite to your brigade.
bf.message.prompt.clan.kick.tip: Kick a player from your brigade

bf.message.prompt.clantag: Enter your new brigade tag. Or leave it blank to clear your brigade tag.

bf.message.prompt.ingame.vote.kick: Enter the username of the player you would like to vote-kick.

bf.message.right.hand: You cannot switch to left-hand while in a match!
bf.message.screenshot.request.error.alre: Failed to request screenshot from player %s. A screenshot request is already pending for this player.
bf.message.screenshot.request.error.time: Failed to receive screenshot from player %s. Request has expired.
bf.message.screenshot.request.error: Error in receiving screenshot. Check log.
bf.message.screenshot.request.sent: Successfully sent screenshot request to player %s. (This may take a few seconds)
bf.message.select.class.tip: %s to select a class and %s to change the class level.
bf.message.shader: You cannot disable shaders while in a match!
bf.message.tutorial.achievements.0: Achievements are earned by completing a variety of in-game challenges and events.
bf.message.tutorial.achievements.1: That "Shot the Sheriff" one is pretty difficult! I'd be surprised if you managed to damage the creator, never-mind kill them!
bf.message.tutorial.achievements.title: Your Achievements
bf.message.tutorial.armory.1: From the armory, you can manage your collection of weapon cosmetics and misc items.
bf.message.tutorial.armory.2: You can manage your armory items in various ways, such as deleting, renaming, equipping, etc.
bf.message.tutorial.armory.3: You can filter between item types by using the bottoms provided on the right-hand side of the armory.
bf.message.tutorial.armory.title: Your Armory
bf.message.tutorial.challenges.0: These are your daily challenges. Which are assigned to you at random, every day.
bf.message.tutorial.challenges.1: Completing daily challenges will earn you in-game goodies, like new skins and misc items.
bf.message.tutorial.challenges.2: Some daily challenges are quite tough and will require some further practice before you can reach them!
bf.message.tutorial.challenges.title: Daily Challenges
bf.message.tutorial.clans.1: From here, you can view your brigade's stats, members, and manage your brigade.
bf.message.tutorial.clans.2: You can also create a new brigade or join an existing one.
bf.message.tutorial.clans.3: Brigade names are unique and can only be used by a brigade at a time. So be sure to choose wisely!
bf.message.tutorial.clans.4: You can view your brigade page from your profile page and view your brigade score from the leaderboard.
bf.message.tutorial.clans.title: Brigades
bf.message.tutorial.classes.0: This is the class selection screen. Woah! Look at how many there are.
bf.message.tutorial.classes.1: *Ahem*... All jokes aside. This is where you select the class that you wish to use while playing.
bf.message.tutorial.classes.2: Be aware that many of the classes have a maximum capacity, and some also require a specific amount of EXP before you can use them.
bf.message.tutorial.classes.3: You can earn this EXP by playing well in matches. That shouldn't be too difficult, right?
bf.message.tutorial.classes.4: Some classes even have multiple levels. Class levels are also unlocked by playing in matches.
bf.message.tutorial.classes.5: You can switch between class levels by clicking the arrows next to the class selection button.
bf.message.tutorial.classes.title: Class Selection
bf.message.tutorial.friends.1: From here, you can view your online friends, as well as your friend requests.
bf.message.tutorial.friends.2: You can accept or decline a friend request simply by clicking on it.
bf.message.tutorial.friends.3: You can also add a friend or view your profile using the buttons at the top.
bf.message.tutorial.friends.title: Friends List
bf.message.tutorial.lobby.edit.0: From the lobby edit screen, you can switch between which game-mode you want to search for.
bf.message.tutorial.lobby.edit.1: You can view all game-modes that are available, as well as the numbers of players currently playing on them.
bf.message.tutorial.lobby.edit.title: Edit Your Lobby
bf.message.tutorial.party.0: Sweet! You've created your own party.
bf.message.tutorial.party.1: You can invite players from your friends list to join your party and then search for a match together.
bf.message.tutorial.party.2: The party leader makes the choice on which game-mode to play, and when to begin a search.
bf.message.tutorial.party.title: Hosting A Party
bf.message.tutorial.profile.0: Welcome to your Profile Page! See how it says {name}? That's YOU!
bf.message.tutorial.profile.1: From here, you can view your in-game stats, achievements as well as change your brigade tag or mood.
bf.message.tutorial.profile.2: Your mood is displayed to the players that you kill. This can be changed by clicking the "Mood" button.
bf.message.tutorial.profile.3: Visiting your profile page is also accessible via the in-game menu.
bf.message.tutorial.profile.4: You can also view your friends profiles from your friends list too! Just click on their name.
bf.message.tutorial.profile.title: Your Profile Page
bf.message.tutorial.rankup.1: Your hard work and dedication have paid off, and I'm excited to see what you'll achieve next.
bf.message.tutorial.rankup.2: Keep up the excellent work, and let's take on the battlefield together. Good luck on your path to the next rank!
bf.message.tutorial.rankup.title: New Rank
bf.message.tutorial.rename.barkowitz.1: That's a great name! I'm flattered.
bf.message.tutorial.scoreboard.0: Welcome to the Scoreboard. From here, you can view a list of the top players within the match-making system.
bf.message.tutorial.scoreboard.1: With some luck, you might find yourself up on that list. I better see a {name} on that list sometime soon!
bf.message.tutorial.scoreboard.2: I haven't played much match-making myself, but I bet I could get on there with some more bootcamp practice...
bf.message.tutorial.scoreboard.title: Player Scoreboard
bf.message.tutorial.store.0: From the store, you can purchase a variety of in-game misc items, which you can then interact with from your armory.
bf.message.tutorial.store.1: Before you ask.. no! You cannot purchase emeralds with real life currency. Everything is earned through simply playing!
bf.message.tutorial.store.title: Item Store
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.0: Welcome to %s! You're {name} right? Thought so!
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.1: My name is Colonel Barkowitz. Don't even think about calling me Bark! I'll be your guide through the mod.
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.2: If I get too annoying, feel free to disable me from the mod settings menu.
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.3: Right! Before we hand you a rifle and kick you into the battlefield, you'll have to complete the bootcamp.
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.4: You can access the bootcamp by clicking the "Start Bootcamp" button at the bottom right!
bf.message.tutorial.welcome.title: Welcome to %s
bf.message.vc.spam.rank: You must be %s or higher to use voice chat!
bf.message.vote.fail.alreadyvote: There is already a vote happening!
bf.message.vote.fail.exist: The given player username doesn't exist!
bf.message.vote.fail.gamemode: You cannot vote on this game-mode!
bf.message.vote.fail.issue: There was an issue with casting a vote! (Try again later)
bf.message.vote.fail.notinteam: The given player is not on your team!
bf.message.vote.fail.recent: Vote is too recent! Please wait a while! (%s)
bf.message.vote.fail.self: You can't vote to kick yourself!
bf.message.vote.howto: Press %s to vote No, %s to vote Yes
bf.message.vote.kick.start: Player %s has started a vote on team %s to kick player %s!
bf.profile.achievements.title: User Achievements
bf.profile.clan.none.description.require: (You must be at least %s to create a brigade)
bf.profile.clan.none.description.self: You can create a brigade by clicking the button below
bf.profile.clan.none.description: This user is not associated with a brigade

bf.profile.main.banned.info: This player is currently banned from the cloud.
bf.profile.main.title: User Main Profile
bf.profile.punishments.title: User Punishments
bf.profile.stats.title: User Statistics
bf.rankup.title: You've Ranked Up!
bf.screen.armory.stickers.set.tooltip: Select a sticker to place here
bf.screen.introduction.disclaimer: %s is not owned by or affiliated with Minecraft, Microsoft or Mojang AB
bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part1: On §7September 1st§r, §71939§r, a conflict would begin that involved a vast majority of the world's nations.
bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part2: Throughout the next §7six years§r, the conflict would take more lives than any previous war.
bf.screen.menu.intro.ww2.part3: It is the §cdeadliest and most destructive conflict §rin human history.
bf.screen.overlay.skip.bootcamp.message: You have the choice to either play or skip bootcamp. If you choose to skip, the option to play bootcamp at a later time will be available.
bf.screen.overlay.skip.bootcamp.title: Playing Bootcamp
bf.screen.report.discord.message: You can report rule-breakers in the %s channel on our official Discord server.
bf.screen.report.discord.title: Join our Discord!
bf.settings.audio.bots.desc: Determines whether bot voice lines should play or not.
bf.settings.audio.capture.point.alarm.de: Determines whether capture point alarms play during their capture.
bf.settings.crosshair.aim.sens.desc: Amount of sensitivity deducted while aiming.
bf.settings.crosshair.alpha.desc: Amount of alpha applied to crosshair while rendering.
bf.settings.crosshair.dynamic.desc: Alter crosshair position depending on player motion.
bf.settings.crosshair.hitmarker.desc: Render the crosshair hit marker when target hit.
bf.settings.crosshair.name: Crosshair
bf.settings.crosshair.render.aiming.desc: Render the crosshair while aiming a weapon
bf.settings.crosshair.scope.sens.desc: Amount of sensitivity deducted while aiming and scoped.
bf.settings.crosshair.spreadfade.desc: Amount of fade applied to crosshair from spread while rendering.
bf.settings.crosshair.static.desc: Prevents crosshair lines from moving with spread.
bf.settings.debug.toggle.armory.uuid.des: Display the stack UUID when hovering over an item in your armory.
bf.settings.experimental.blood.smoke.des: Spawn blood smoke particles on impacted entities.
bf.settings.experimental.bullet.eject.pu: Spawn bullet eject puff particles on weapon fire.
bf.settings.experimental.bullet.holes.de: Render bullet holes on impacted blocks.
bf.settings.experimental.bullet.smoke.de: Spawn bullet smoke particles on impacted blocks.
bf.settings.experimental.immersive.bobbi: The scale of the immersive bobbing effect.
bf.settings.experimental.inspection.blur: Whether background blur effect renders while inspecting an item.
bf.settings.experimental.scoreboard.blur: Whether background blur effect renders behind the scoreboard.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.aim.desc: Determines whether aim should toggle by single or held right-clicking.
Toggles a very experimental bobbing effect for the players camera.
Whether dynamic lighting is applied while shooting.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.gore.des: Whether gore and blood effects render.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.immersiv: Toggles a very experimental, immersive bobbing effect for the players camera.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.muzzlefl: Toggles the muzzle flash effect while shooting a weapon.
bf.settings.experimental.toggle.smoke.so: Whether smoke particles should fade near blocks.
bf.settings.notifications.achievements.d: Show notification when you unlock a new achievement.
bf.settings.notifications.daily.challeng: Show notification when you complete a daily challenge.
Show notification when friends log in or out of the mod.
bf.settings.notifications.friend.prestig: Show notification when friends level up their prestige.
bf.settings.notifications.rank.ups.desc: Show notification when you rank-up your profile.

bf.settings.save.prompt.title: Unsaved Changes
bf.settings.ui.constant.hotbar.desc: Keep the hotbar display shown rather than between switching items.
bf.settings.ui.render.blur.desc: Whether background blur effect renders behind certain interfaces.
bf.settings.ui.render.damageindicators.d: Whether damage indicators should render while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.game.compass.desc: Whether compass renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.game.minimap.desc: Whether minimap renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.hud.desc: Whether HUD renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.killfeed.desc: Whether kill feed renders while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.render.waypoints.desc: Whether waypoints render while in a match.
bf.settings.ui.tab.background.desc: Whether the background renders behind the player tab.
bf.settings.ui.tab.blur.desc: Whether the blur is applied behind the player tab.
bf.settings.ui.tab.death.motion.sickness: Covers up the death camera with a black screen.
bf.settings.ui.tutorial.desc: Whether Colonel Barkowitz helps guide you through the mod.
bf.settings.ui.weapon.silhouette.desc: Whether kill-feed weapons render as a white silhouette.
